any one know how i can open port 4662?: it's open by default. Ubuntu does not use firewalling software by default.
if you need to forward the port from your router, you'll need to check your router's documentation. If the router is provided by your ISP, perhaps your ISP's support web site has more details.
use a paste web site, please :)
is there another program using tpc/4662?
some program is already listening on port 4662. You may use `netstat -ntlp|grep 4662' to find which.
it's not dpkg's fault; it's the package's
is something else listening on tcp/21?
inetd is already listening on 21, which implies you probably have another ftp daemon configured to use inetd
